defaultProjects.name: Hawaiian Airlines Web Modernization
defaultProjects.description: With over 90 years of continuous service, Hawaiian Airlines is the largest operator of commercial flights to and from the U.S. state of Hawaii and is Hawaii's biggest and longest-serving airline. • The Hawaiian Airlines website provides guests with the ability to book and manage their flights and view details about the state of Hawaii • The majority of tickets are booked through the website • A large number of guests perform check-ins using the website HawaiianAirlines.com The purpose of the project is to replace the legacy website. Issues include: • Deprecated technologies increasing the risk of security vulnerabilities and lack of experienced developers • Complex design leading to issues, such as low reusability, testing, etc. • PSS change means touching the code Motivation Web Modernization.

defaultProjects.name: NLP for Aircraft Maintenance
defaultProjects.description:
BUSINESS PROBLEM
Need for increasing accuracy and specificity of maintenance data input by engineers as well as mitigating barrier to entry. Currently, Work Unit Codes (“WUCs”) must be manually chosen by traversing a large tree, making some inputs erroneous or too broad. Existing processes are time-consuming to acclimate to and regularly use. SOLUTION
A Python web application using natural language processing on historical data and provided WUC trees to convert user inputs into WUCs. ● Takes in user input description
● Predicts possible matching WUCs
● Displays the likelihood percentage along with the
description of each WUC

defaultProjects.name: Phase Maintenance Inspection (PMI) Software for Rotary Wing Aircraft
defaultProjects.description:
Purpose: This project was to develop a basic interface PMI
Scheduler which could help organize and keep track of
military aircraft as it goes through its maintenance inspection
Background Information: After visiting on base and
learning about their systems regarding Phase Maintenance
Inspection we decided together that the best software we
could develop would be a scheduler. Eliminating confusion in
scheduling since they currently use a variety of ways to track
their maintenance from paper to excel which heavily rely on
workers to track. Features:
● Simplified Design
○ Our sponsor wanted a software that was visually easy to
use where you could just click and add a PMI event
● Scheduler listed time
○ With this feature you can adjust how you see the
scheduler based on your time frame(day, month,
quarter, year)
● Adjustability of PMI Events
○ Adjustability was an important feature as our sponsor
wanted the ability to drag and move PMI events as the
total days increase
● Change Phase Lane Names
○ This feature gives the user the ability to change how
each phase lane is titled
● Add Phase Lanes
○ Phase lanes are no longer stagnant and can be added to
the bottom of the scheduler
● Displays Basic PMI Information
○ Hovering over the PMI events will show basic
information needed to keep track of the PMI Schedules
● Begin Non-Working Days Page
○ As seen in the navbar we have begun work on a page
where a user could input new holidays or other non-
working days which would in the future connect to be
seen on the main scheduler page

defaultProjects.name: Fairy Dust Fighter Logistics Wargame
defaultProjects.description:
Create a homegrown logistics simulation based on
executable, sustainable, and real-world constraints.
Be able to simulate concepts such as running out of
fuel, water, ammunition, or medical supplies, critical
cargo shipments needed to fix a downed transport
aircraft, enemy engagement, medivacs, etc.

Issues include: • Deprecated technologies increasing the risk of security vulnerabilities and lack of experienced developers • Complex design leading to issues, such as low reusability, testing, etc. • PSS change means touching the code Motivation Web Modernization.

defaultProjects.name: NutriSnap
defaultProjects.description: NutriSnap is an app that lets you take a picture of your meal, the app identifies the food, calculates how much is on the plate, and provides nutritional information. The process involves building a machine learning model that processes these images and uses APIs to give detailed calorie counts and food quality ratings based on the NOVA classification. The main goal of NutriSnap is to create an enjoyable and easy- to-use tool that helps people maintain healthy eating habits.

defaultProjects.name: Open Power Quality
defaultProjects.description: Open source hardware and software for distributed power quality data collection, analysis, and visualization.

defaultProjects.name: WRENCH
defaultProjects.description: WRENCH is an open-source library for developing simulators for large-scale scientific computation

defaultProjects.name: Cyber Canoe
defaultProjects.description: Software for Unity projects involving stereoscopic resolution driven by 9 PCs with a GeForce 980 graphics card.

defaultProjects.name: UnityVis Hawaii
defaultProjects.description: A research project exploring the use of Unity for data visualization applications, with a focus on showcasing Hawaii's unique landscapes and cultural heritage.

defaultProjects.name: OceanAI: Marine Data Analysis
defaultProjects.description: OceanAI aims to develop AI algorithms for analyzing marine data collected around the Hawaiian islands, contributing to ocean conservation and research efforts.

defaultProjects.name: VirtualTourHawaii: VR Exploration
defaultProjects.description: VirtualTourHawaii is a virtual reality project offering immersive tours of Hawaii's iconic landmarks and natural wonders, developed using Unity.
